data.message: MCP Security Critical (2025-2026): 1) OAuth 2.1 now standard for HTTP transports, OAuth 2.0 replaced custom auth. 2) Major vulnerabilities: CVE-2025-6514 (mcp-remote) compromised 437K+ dev environments. 3) Attack vectors: prompt injection (OWASP LLM01), tool poisoning (hidden instructions in metadata), rug pull attacks (tools mutate after install). 4) 43% of public MCP servers had command injection flaws. 5) Mitigations: sandbox execution, TLS 1.3/AES-256 encryption, RFC 8707 resource indicators, granular authorization, MFA for admin access.
